body.name: EasyAcc Portable Hand Held Fan, Ultra Quiet 5 Speed Personal Fan, LED Dispay USB C Rechargeable Handheld Fan, 180° Foldable Small Desk Fan, Electric Cooling Fan&PowerBank for Office Home Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 17 mins
features: 【Powerful & Ultra Quiet 5 Speed Portable Fan】Do you want to have more speed wind choice in different condition? EasyAcc Portable Fan with 5 speed will satisfy your need. This personal fan's noise lower than other 99% handheld fan on Amazon. Quiet and different speed fit for sleeping, reading, working, travel etc in home, office or outdoor.

【18H Working Time & Emergecy Powerbank】The Portable Handheld Fan can work continuously for 3-18 hours. And with newly TYPE-C charging port for faster charging speed, only 3 hours can be fully charged. This Handheld Fan can also work as powerbank, it can charge for your mobile phone durring outdoor activites on emergency.
【LED Battery Level Indicator】Comes with digital display, you can see the remaining power easily and timely, avoid sudden power off. EasyAcc make life convenient and easy.
【180° Foldable Multipurpose Design 3 in 1 Fan】The Hand Held fan can Fold into 180° work as different fan. ① Small Desk Fan, ② Hand Fan, take it for outdoor, ③ hang on neck to free your hand.

【What Make EasyAcc Different】There are several model of handheld fan with LED on Amazon, but there are some different in details. ① Material, we adopt advanced ABS material better quality, color looks more advanced, more durable. ② The handle is more ergonomic, hold it more comfortable. ③ The Lanyard to wear more smoothly and comfortable. EasyAcc is worth to trust.

【LifeTime Warranty】EasyAcc specializes in FAN industry over 10 years, with advanced and mature technique, quality is guaranteed and worth trust. We provide lifetime warranty, no worry click to add into the shopping cart!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product especially for times you don't need or want to use a big fan.
reviews.reviewText: I had a fan like this before and loved it. The new one is even better. It has great power. I only use it on low speed and find it cools me off just fine. Battery life is pretty long and it charges up in a fairly short amount of time too. It goes anywhere-even helpful in the car. It's pretty quiet overall. The price is reasonable for such a great little fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. Charges and works well for over a span of 4 hours I’d say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing portable fan to bring in your bag everyday!
reviews.reviewText: I am SO glad I bought this fan!!! It's spectacular, and I've been using it every day since I got it.The fan is very small and portable, so I can take it with me wherever I go. It's also very quiet, so I can use it in the office without disturbing anyone.The fan has 5 speeds, so I can adjust it to the perfect setting for me. It also has a built-in LED display that shows the battery level, so I always know how much juice it has left.The fan is rechargeable, and it comes with a USB-C cable. I can charge it from my computer, my phone charger, or even my power bank.Overall, I'm very happy with this fan. You could say I'm a HUGE fan. (pun intended LOL)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Fan And Battery Life
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a trip to Disney World and it was worth it. They were in a week long dry spell so there was no afternoon showers to keep the temps down and it was unbearably hot. This fan pushed a good amount of air and the digital power meter meant I could confidently use it throughout the day without fear that the battery would die on me. I definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable Hand Held Fan, Ultra Quiet 5 Speed Personal Fan, LED Dispay USB C Rechargeable
reviews.reviewText: I use the Portable Hand Held Fan LED Display on my in my additional to my A/C. This summer with the triple-digit heat, is a must have it.I love the LED Display because you can actually see how much is charged, and when in use you can see how much is left, or when you can charge it again. It's ultra quiet and very light. I love this little cute thing. Very easy to recharge using the USB. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fan, but... so SLOW to ship and arrive!
reviews.reviewText: This fan has a few features most of the others don't have: A tiny battery strength meter display that tells you % of battery charge. That doubles as a momentary fan speed display (1 thru 5!) when you select a new speed. It also has a foldable battery /handle that doubles as a hand held handle or a stand that should hold the fan upright on a table. And, it has a removable strap that is supposed to hang the fan around your neck so you can have it blowing on your face (that's where most of us need the blowing air, right?).BUT...1. That strap thing doesn't hold the fan right side up on your chest! The fan keeps flopping over sideways! No way to make the strap function useful!2. The shipping is TERRIBLE! I like the fan I have, so I ordered a new one on June 8th, and it won't be delivered until 8 days later! June 16th! It was 3 days before it even left the source in Baltimore, MD, and from there, they predict 5 more days to get it to Las Vegas. And, I'm a premier Amazon customer paying a big fee for fast shipping of all items ordered. Let's hope they can ship one of these fans faster to you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for everyday
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for Louisiana heat. Easy and fast to charge. Great for football games and anything outdoors!

Wir benutzen den Ventilator, um das Essen unserer Kinder abzukühlen.Weil uns das ständige gepuste auf die Nerven gegangen ist, haben wir uns zum Kauf entschieden.Der Ventilator hat eine gute Leistung und ist auf Stufe 1 sehr leise.Einziges Manko ist, dass die Prozentanzeige für den Akku rasch absinkt, bis es im 20 % Bereich liegt. Hier braucht es dann deutlich länger und er hält noch lange durch.

È più potente rispetto alle nostre aspettative, alla massima potenza rinfresca davvero quando ci si trova fuori, durante una giornata calda! Si può utilizzare anche ad una potenza più bassa e non è male, in modo da far durare ancora di più la batteria. Siamo soddisfatti di questo acquisto.
このメーカーのものをここのところ使っていますが、モーターの性能が良いのか２年はフル稼働（夏場だけでなく冬場も使用）で使っても全く問題なく使えています。旧モデルの唯一の欠点は自立できないところでしたが、新しいモデルは９０°に折りたたんだ状態でちゃんと自立させられます。パソコンの横に置いて使っていますが、風力も４段階で調節できるなど、ちゃんと進化しています。
Exactly what I was looking for, not too loud, battery lasts a good while.

Der Ventilator liegt gut in der Hand, hat ein schönes Design und hat mit seinen 5 Leistungsstufen genug Power. Dabei ist noch ein Ladekabel und eine Handschlaufe. Begeistern tut mich bei diesem Ventilator gegenüber bei anderen, dass man diesen, wenn man den Griff knickt, diesen Ventilator auf einen Tisch stellen kann und somit beide Hände frei hat um zb etwas zu essen. Der Akku hat eine lange Laufzeit. Bin total begeistert!!
